## Source: ossf-package-analysis (507cfdb034cfdde119a280e16b6ad66952ff26fd821fd25ec866bf04f29398f1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'billing.api' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
